author: rahul
msg: Recommend different short names for new taglibs. Changing to val for shale-validator and v for shale-view.

author: hlship
msg: Switch tests to use nice mocks instead of strict mocks
Give greater control over invoking super class methods when adding new methods to a class
Change ComponentWorker to collect mixin information (from @Mixins and @MixinClasses)
Update PageLoader to make use of declared instance mixins

author: rahul
msg: Move quick links section to the bottom of the menus. Lets put the directly related (to Shale) links first, visible without the need for verical scrolling.

author: marvin
msg: Rework chaz_init so that the os name gets recorded to the config file.
